column3: Order your companion to follow you.
Allow your companion to make his own decisions in battle.
Order your companion to focus on defensive maneuvers, using only actions learned from the \x02\x13\x06\xfe\xff\xff{\x1a\x03Defender\x02\x13\x02\xec\x03 skill tree.
Order your companion to focus more on offensive maneuvers, using only actions learned from the \x02\x13\x06\xfe\xff\xff{\x1a\x03Attacker\x02\x13\x02\xec\x03 skill tree.
Order your companion to stop fighting and concentrate on healing maneuvers, using only actions learned from the \x02\x13\x06\xfe\xff\xff{\x1a\x03Healer\x02\x13\x02\xec\x03 skill tree.
